General.Name: SM Wirtschaftsberatungs AG
General.Description: SM Wirtschaftsberatungs AG engages in the investment, rental, and management of residential and commercial properties in Germany. It also redesigns buildings. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Sindelfingen, Germany. SM Wirtschaftsberatungs AG is a subsidiary of RCM Beteiligungs AG.
